extendedInfo.description: The iPlanner, the Annual Meeting Planner mobile application, allows users to search or browse 2012 meeting sessions or to create a customized itinerary. The application syncs with the online Meeting ePlanner, so any itinerary changes made online will automatically update to your mobile version.Other features include:â¢ Links to related abstracts and Educational Book articles â¢ Ability to search for nearby sessions â¢ Ability to add and e-mail annotations to sessions in your itinerary â¢ Interactive map of McCormick Place that plots session locations â¢ Exhibitor list, including company descriptions and booth numbers that link to exhibit map â¢ Twitter feed that highlights exactly what ASCO, members, and attendees are saying about the Annual Meeting â¢ Bus schedules, routes and departure gates â¢ Eating options around the convention center â¢ Suggestions of things to do in Chicago

reviews.title: BUGS
reviews.comment: Great assist but it had alot of bugs
reviews.author: A Google User
